charges.charge_description: 18:286: CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES WITH RESPECT TO CLAIMS(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Bureau of prisons for term of 48 months. This term consists of 24 months on count 1 and 24 months on count 26, to be served consecutively. Supervised release for 3 years under terms and conditions of US Probation Office and General Order 318. Special assessment of $200.00. Restitution of $37,706. All fines waived

charges.charge_disposition: The Court grants the Government's motion to dismiss all remaining counts of the indictment
